Service

Primary Care – Payment Options in Wilson, NC

PAYMENT OPTIONS We accept NC Medicaid, Medicare, Tricare, Cigna, Aetna, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Self-Pay, Cash and all Major Credit Cards. We accept Patients without Insurance.

Confidential care. No referral required.

What this service is

PAYMENT OPTIONS We accept NC Medicaid, Medicare, Tricare, Cigna, Aetna, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Self-Pay, Cash and all Major Credit Cards. We accept Patients without Insurance.

Primary Care – Payment Options

Content will be updated as needed. Please contact our team for more details.

Who it’s for

People seeking support for recovery, mental wellness, or life challenges who want structured, compassionate care.

Benefits

  • Clear next steps and supportive guidance
  • Confidential, respectful care
  • Coordinated support tailored to you

What to expect

  • Personalized intake to understand your goals and needs
  • Clear care plan with measurable milestones
  • Coordinated support from our clinical team
  • Regular progress check-ins and adjustments

What happens when you call

  1. We listen and answer immediate questions.
  2. We explain your options and next steps.
  3. If you choose, we schedule an appointment.

No referral required.

FAQ

How do I start Primary Care – Payment Options?

Call us or request an appointment and our team will guide you through next steps.

Do you accept insurance?

We can verify benefits and review coverage options before you begin.

What does scheduling look like?

We offer flexible scheduling based on clinical needs and availability.

Ready to take the next step?

Call today or request an appointment. We’ll listen, answer your questions, and help you move forward.

Call Now Request an Appointment

Confidential care. No referral required.
